Mosquito-0.1.0.0: A stateless LCF-style implementation of higher-order logic in Haskell.

Safe HaskellNone

Mosquito.ProofState.PreTactics

Description

Implements some basic tactics corresponding to the rules found in the kernel and in the file DerivedRules.hs.

Documentation

type Justification = [Theorem] -> Inference Theorem

type LocalEdit = [Term] -> Term -> Inference (Justification, [([Term], Term)])

type TermLocalEdit = Term -> LocalEdit

type TheoremLocalEdit = Theorem -> LocalEdit

data PreTactic

Instances

type TermPreTactic = Term -> PreTactic

type TheoremPreTactic = Theorem -> PreTactic

localEdit :: forall arr. Arrow arr => Lens arr PreTactic LocalEdit

mkPreTactic :: String -> LocalEdit -> PreTactic

alphaP :: PreTactic

symmetryL :: LocalEdit

symmetryP :: PreTactic

abstractL :: LocalEdit

abstractP :: PreTactic

combineL :: LocalEdit

combineP :: PreTactic

betaP :: PreTactic

etaP :: PreTactic

equalityModusPonensP :: TermPreTactic

assumeP :: PreTactic

solveL :: TheoremLocalEdit

solveP :: TheoremPreTactic
